doc.previous: There are six major newspapers in Liberia and 45 of the population has a mobile phone service Much of Liberia s communications infrastructure was destroyed or plundered during the two civil wars 1989 1996 and 1999 2003 79 With low rates of adult literacy and high poverty rates television and newspaper use is limited leaving radio as the predominant means of communicating with the public 80
doc.after: Liberia s economic main links to the outside world come through Monrovia via the port and airport in the capital
